channel.title: immunity on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in immunity on funPlantGenes

item.title: AGO2a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc02g069260 Gene Symbol: AGO2a Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: AGO2a but not AGO2b mediates antiviral defense against infection of wild-type cucumber mosaic virus in tomato.

item.title: AGO2b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc02g069270 Gene Symbol: AGO2b Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: AGO2a but not AGO2b mediates antiviral defense against infection of wild-type cucumber mosaic virus in tomato.

item.title: CaAGL8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaAGL8 Gene Name: Agamous-like MADS-box protein AGL8-like protein Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: MADS-box protein AGL8 interacts with chromatin-remodelling component SWC4 to activate thermotolerance and environment-dependent immunity in pepper.

item.title: CaAIL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ca12g04370 Gene Symbol: CaAIL1 Gene Name: AP2 transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaAIL1 Acts Positively in Pepper Immunity against Ralstonia solanacearum by Repressing Negative Regulators.

item.title: CaARF9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Capana00g000236 Gene Symbol: CaARF9 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Demonstrate that an auxin response factor, CaARF9, has dual roles in enhancing the immune resistance to Ralstonia solanacearum infection and in retarding plant growth by repressing the expression of its target genes as exemplified by Casmc4, CaLBD37, CaAPK1b and CaRROP1.

item.title: CaASR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaASR1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaASR1 promotes salicylic acid- but represses jasmonic acid-dependent signaling to enhance the resistance of Capsicum annuum to bacterial wilt by modulating CabZIP63.

item.title: CabZIP63
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CA01g21080 Gene Symbol: CabZIP63 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Pepper CabZIP63 acts as a positive regulator during Ralstonia solanacearum or high temperature–high humidity challenge in a positive feedback loop with CaWRKY40.

item.title: CaCDPK29
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaCDPK29 Gene Name: calcium-dependent protein kinase 29 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: A CaCDPK29–CaWRKY27b module promotes CaWRKY40-mediated thermotolerance and immunity to Ralstonia solanacearum in pepper.

item.title: CaERF3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: T459_19920 Gene Symbol: CaERF3 Gene Name: Ethylene-responsive transcription factor 3 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Herein, we showed that immunity against R.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CA04g04250 Gene Symbol: CaLecRK-S.5 Gene Name: lectin receptor kinase Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaLecRK-S.

item.title: CaLRR-RLK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaLRR-RLK1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaLRR-RLK1, a novel RD receptor-like kinase from Capsicum annuum and transcriptionally activated by CaHDZ27, act as positive regulator in Ralstonia solanacearum resistance.

item.title: CaMLO1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Capana08g000221 Gene Symbol: CaMLO1 Gene Name: mildew resistance locus O 1 Genome: Genome assembly Pepper Zunla 1 Ref_v1.

item.title: CaPUB21
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Capana08g000105 Gene Symbol: CaPUB21 Gene Name: U-box domain-containing protein 21 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaPUB21 acted positively in immunity at 28 °C but negatively at 37 °C.

item.title: CaSWC4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaSWC4 Gene Name: SWR1-complex protein 4 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaSWC4 regulates the immunity-thermotolerance tradeoff by recruiting CabZIP63/CaWRKY40 to target genes and activating chromatin in pepper.

item.title: CaWRKY27b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CA03g20260 Gene Symbol: CaWRKY27b Gene Name: Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: A CaCDPK29–CaWRKY27b module promotes CaWRKY40-mediated thermotolerance and immunity to Ralstonia solanacearum in pepper.

item.title: GhTINY2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GhD06G0642 Gene Symbol: GhTINY2 Gene Name: Genome: Cotton Functional Genomics Database Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Orchestration of plant development and defense by indirect crosstalk of salicylic acid and brassinosteorid signaling via transcription factor GhTINY2.

item.title: GhWAK13
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GH_A05G2392 Gene Symbol: GhWAK13 Gene Name: wall-associated kinase 13 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Wall-associated kinase GhWAK13 mediates arbuscular mycorrhizal symbiosis and Verticillium wilt resistance in cotton.

item.title: GmBIR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.16G079200 Gene Symbol: GmBIR1 Gene Name: BAK1-INTERACTING RECEPTOR LIKE KINASE1 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The soybean immune receptor GmBIR1 regulates host transcriptome, spliceome, and immunity during cyst nematode infection.

item.title: GmCAT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.14G223500 Gene Symbol: GmCAT1 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Upon binding to GmDPB, PsAvh113 decreased the transcription of the downstream gene GmCAT1, which acts as a positive regulator of plant immunity.

item.title: GmDPB
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.01G228100 Gene Symbol: GmDPB Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Upon binding to GmDPB, PsAvh113 decreased the transcription of the downstream gene GmCAT1, which acts as a positive regulator of plant immunity.

item.title: GmDR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.10g094800 Gene Symbol: GmDR1 Gene Name: Glycine max disease resistance 1 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Transient expression of the green fluorescent protein fused GmDR1 protein in soybean leaves showed that it is a plasma membrane protein.

item.title: GmNNL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.02G076900 Gene Symbol: GmNNL1 Gene Name: Nodule Number Locus 1 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: G.

item.title: GmRPA3a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma19g38100 Gene Symbol: GmRPA3a Gene Name: Replication Protein A subunit 3 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Replication protein A subunit 3 and the iron efficiency response in soybean.

item.title: GmRPA3b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma03g35460 Gene Symbol: GmRPA3b Gene Name: Replication Protein A subunit 3 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Replication protein A subunit 3 and the iron efficiency response in soybean.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma20g24590 Gene Symbol: GmRPA3c Gene Name: Replication Protein A subunit 3 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Replication protein A subunit 3 and the iron efficiency response in soybean.

item.title: GmRPA3d
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma10g42530 Gene Symbol: GmRPA3d Gene Name: Replication Protein A subunit 3 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Replication protein A subunit 3 and the iron efficiency response in soybean.

item.title: HvCEBiP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TA30910_4513 Gene Symbol: HvCEBiP Gene Name: CEBiP chitin receptor Genome: barley EST database Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: Our findings suggest that HvWRKY2 represses barley basal immunity by directly targeting pathogen-associated molecular pattern (PAMP) recognition receptor genes, suggesting that HvCEBiP and likely chitin signaling function in barley PAMP-triggered immune responses to Bgh infection.

item.title: HvMKK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvMKK1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: Our data suggest that the HvMKK1-HvMPK4 kinase pair acts upstream of HvWRKY1 to negatively regulate barley immunity against powdery mildew.

item.title: HvMPK4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvMPK4 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: HvMPK4 phosphorylates HvWRKY1 to enhance its suppression of barley immunity to powdery mildew fungus.

item.title: HvSTP13
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvSTP13 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: The expression of HvSTP13 increased on bacterial and fungal pathogen-associated molecular pattern (PAMP) application, suggesting a PAMP-triggered signalling that converged on the transcriptional induction of the gene.

item.title: HvWRKY1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvWRKY1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: HvWRKY1 is phosphorylated in barley at the early stages of Bgh infection, which enhances its suppression on barley immunity likely due to enhanced DNA-binding and transcriptional repression activity.

item.title: HvWRKY2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvWRKY2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: Our findings suggest that HvWRKY2 represses barley basal immunity by directly targeting pathogen-associated molecular pattern (PAMP) recognition receptor genes, suggesting that HvCEBiP and likely chitin signaling function in barley PAMP-triggered immune responses to Bgh infection.

item.title: NbPIP2;4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NbPIP2;4 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Nicotiana benthamiana Functional Description: this study elucidates a conserved and novel pathway caused by GP1pro to initiate host cellular defences by targeting the plant aquaporin protein NbPIP2;4 and transporting apoplast-to-cytoplast H2O2 to regulate plant immunity.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: StbZIP61 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: The potato transcription factor StbZIP61 regulates dynamic biosynthesis of salicylic acid in defense against Phytophthora infestans infection.

item.title: StIPP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: PGSC0003DMG400016891 Gene Symbol: StIPP Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Description: In Arabidopsis protoplasts, expression of StIPP resulted in the stabilization of the PAMP receptor, FLAGELLIN-SENSITIVE 2, indicating that StIPP may act as a PAMP-induced and localized antagonist of PtdIns(4,5)P2-dependent processes during plant immunity.

item.title: StLRPK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: StLRPK1 Gene Name: LRR receptor-like kinase 1 Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: A potato STRUBBELIG-RECEPTOR FAMILY member, StLRPK1, associates with StSERK3A/BAK1 and activates immunity.

item.title: StMKK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Sotub12g010200.1.1 Gene Symbol: StMKK1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: Found that StMKK1 negatively regulated potato resistance to the hemibiotrophic/biotrophic pathogens P.

item.title: StMKK5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Sotub03g022560 Gene Symbol: StMKK5 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: The potato StMKK5-StSIPK module enhances resistance to Phytophthora pathogens through activating the salicylic acid and ethylene signalling pathways.

item.title: StMLP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Soltu.DM.06G027430.1 Gene Symbol: StMLP1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: StMLP1, as a Kunitz trypsin inhibitor, enhances potato resistance and specifically expresses in vascular bundles during Ralstonia solanacearum infection.
